title: LAVA Z66 (Marine Blue, 32 GB)  (3 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, USB Cable, Charger, SIM Ejector Pin, Screen Film, Back Case Protection Film
product_specification.Operating Frequency: GSM: 850 MHz, 900 MHz, 1800 MHz, 1900 MHz, WCDMA: 900 MHz, 2100 MHz, 4G VoLTE: FDD - 1358, TDD - 4041
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 13MP + 5MP AF Rear Camera (1.12µm Pixel, F/ 2.0), 4x Zoom, Beauty Mode, HDR Mode, Burst Mode, Panorama, Night, Time Lapse, Slow Motion, Filters
product_specification.Flash: Rear LED Flash | Front LED Flash
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Sensor, Accelerometer, Proximity, Ambient Light Sensor
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Handset Warranty and 6 Months Warranty on Accessories

product_description.Find Your Focus: This smartphone’s 13-megapixel power selfie camera with screen flash helps quench your thirst for amazing selfies.
product_description.Bring the World Closer to You: Its dual-rear-camera system (13 MP + 5 MP) helps you click stunning photographs of everything that you find pretty – be it nature or your favourite people.
product_description.A Bigger Experience on Your Way: Thanks to its 15.44-centimetre (6.08) screen and 19:9 notch, you can enjoy everything ranging from your favourite video content to video calls from your loved ones in a crystal-clear and immersive fashion.
product_description.Run Your World: You enjoy high-speed performance and ample storage space for your files as this smartphone comes with up to 3 GB of RAM and 32 GB of ROM.

review:
Everything thing is gud at this price. The phone is fully worth it. Nd even comparing this model with the other smartphones offer by the Chinese company like oppo-vivo-redmi-realme is not that much fair as Lava is an Indian company which don't have that much financial support like those companies. Yet by this model it is clear that the company is trying very hard to compete with the others. Although no one will deny that their is a large scope of improvement specially in the software.

Hardware is pretty gud. Except the processor they must go for the chipset of Qualcomm or MediaTek that will improve the performance in much better way.

But at the last again I will say that u will not face any big issue related to either hardware or software if u use this phone for the modrate work.

Support Make in India. Let's change vocal into global.

Got this phone yesterday,bought it for my wife.Its a decent phone looks well camera is ok don't expect too much ,build quality is good . battery is going 1.5 day on moderate use. Now the main highlight of this phone is its clean stock android phone. No cleaning apps no bloatware you will get a clean ui ,app drawer left side swipe will get u Google assistant . In this case it beats it's Chinese rivals ,if you are a normal user you can buy this

After used 1 Month Honest Review :-
Rating:-
5/5 For Camera (Super high quality )
5/5 For Performance of Mobile
5/5 For Design & Quality of Mobile
4/5 For Battary Life
5/5 For Security

Additional Feature:-
1.Provide Extra 1GB space as compare all other company 32 gb Mobile.
2.Camera Quality are Very very Good (LAVA provide original camera not like AI camera( beauty plus camera)
3.No additional Software installed they stolen your personal data.

Suggestion For Improvement
1. Provide additional option Like 4GB ,6 GB ,8 GB RAM and Internal upto 64 GB , 128 GB Plus
2. Update User Interface
3. Provide in other Colors

If you support National Interest, you will like it. Good display, Latest android , Satisfactory camera, 3 GB Ram and Indian Brand. Go for it !!! It would be better if the company provide back cover and earphone. Flipkart Delivery as usual best in the market.

#ProudlyIndian this is what i wanted to see with my purchase. And also comming to what this phone offers in this price range is total value for money.
Pros:
No bloatware
Stock Android
Very good performance
Average camera, very good acc to the price range
Very good design
And good battery backup.

Cons. Of this phone is not a problem for me because, I have bought it for moderate use at home and it finally fits all the needs.

So, for me it was a good purchase.

It is good phone in this price. I love it.
The camera is better than redmi note 6 pro because I use redmi note 6 pro also.

Everything is good..But there is no Screen Protection guard,No back Cover,no warranty card in the box,..But Phone performance is too good,very good looking,camera is too good, battery performance is also good,touch is good

Best phone in 7000-8000 price range. 3 gb ram 32 gb rom. Stock android. No extra app. Clean software. 13 mp camera in front and back. Camera quality is sharp and clear both side. Good video calling quality. Screen in crystal clear. Played video on YouTube in 1080 resolution. Viewable from all sides. No distortion in sunlight. Phone looks is gorgeous from back and front. Calling quality is good and voice and volume are good. I don't know why this phone rating is low. I think they are obsessed with redmi realme. They will pay higher for Chinese products but not pay same amount to an Indian company products. I am very much satisfied with this phone. As I love Stock android phones.

I feel proud myself to buy Indian products. Very Good mobile model launch by LAVA. It's preferable to buy at this price.
You will get all the features, which generally get it in other Chinish phones

Actually when I get this mobile from delivery agent I opened that and I am really impressed about its red look, it's really shining and after starting the mobile I really like performance of the mobile phone. Really good and appreciating product by lava. Really proud to this Indian company. #ProudlyIndian

Everything thing is gud at this price. The phone is fully worth it. Nd even comparing this model with the other smartphones offer by the Chinese company like oppo-vivo-redmi-realme is not that much fair as Lava is an Indian company which don't have that much financial support like those companies. Based on the Budget it exceeds expectations. Also, it's an Indian brand which I believe is the most important factor for me. I might have been slightly liberal with the review but I strongly believe if we support by buying Indian brands and give constructive feedback it will bring in good competition to Chinese phones. Having said that couple of constructive feedback. Display and Camera quality can be improved. Also, for future phones lava should seriously consider Type C charging point. Else everything is Good based on its budget..

I play free fire in this mobile and I am shocked to see that the game does not got a single lag ... now who said that Indian mobiles are very bad.. two things I hate in this mobile that we cannot hide apps and we cannot put app lock on this mobile .... other things are very awesome in this mobile... so go for this mobile

I am writing this review after using Lava Z66 for 1 week. When I inserted my Jio sim the Internet was working fine but the VoLTE was not working. There was no any option of enabling VoLTE in this phone, but when I inserted another Jio sim all the functions was working and the same Sim which was not working in this set, was working fine in my honor 7a phone. I replaced the Sim from Jio store then VoLTE activated but sms was not working. It was activated three days before.
Other features like camera, battery backup is superb. Finger touch processing is little bit slow.
I may suggest to purchase this phone. It is a budget phone.

Using Lava smartphone from last 3 years and with the same confidence and Made in/by India pride, got the new Z66. Quite happy with looks, display, battery backup, front camera, call clarity, phone weight, OS and overall performance of the phone. But Lava this time disappointed me with back camera performance. The color reproduction is very poor and lacks the required image clarity. Hope Lava improves it to possible extent in future software updates. Else the rear dual camera module is total failure on the hardware part. Users deserve a better camera performance for 8k spend. Still eyeing for Lava's next powerpack device.
I found many issues on this Phone

1. Dust came into front camera in just 3 days.
2. Network connectivity issues.
3. It is only reading the sim, which I inserted after unboxing the mobile.
3. Sim tray get pushed below the surface level.
4. Volume + - freeze for a while when you press + or -
5. No Data switch shortcut present.
6. Touch response is slow if compared to other mobile in the same range.
etc
etc

So far so so it's ok ok for usage..not too good not too bad..only the display features disappear at times..the phone's display light goes away at times..even for hours on end..the power button to view the phone's lockscreen or homepage doesn't work at various points of time..that too, including hours on end(as I said the same as mentioned above)..the phone doesn't light up during those times..takes restarts/reboots or longer hours to wake up or allow the user to view it..that's inclusive of features like screen locks/fingerprint touches also,unfortunately..these features also didn't/don't work out at all when the afore-stated problems and troubles appear and crop up..well,frankly speaking and honestly,confessing these are some highly irritating,disturbing,disgraceful as well as patience-tasting moments and issues for a customer..

there has not been a single android security update since February. lava either provide decent support to your phone or leave the market. since this phone uses god knows what processor i cannot install any custom software.
coming to the network coverage area, it is worse that your feature phones. you almost never get 4g connection not even 3g, it stays on EDGE network, so i cannot use internet in this phone.
the fingerprint sensor malfunctioned and was heating a lot after 4 months of purchase, service center was not helping me so i had to cut the wire that connects the fp sensor to the motherboard.
to anyone thinking of buying any lava phone . please don't it's waste of money. if you don't wanna buy a Chinese brand then either save some money and get a Samsung or get the micro-max phones, at least they provide support to their phones.

Got it at 5728 after 10% standard + rs 250 on a citi account.

Considering the price the perfomance is acceptable, however there are some areas of improvements that LAVA need pay attention to if they want to compete in Indian budgent phone market.

Areas of improvement that probably can be fixed through an OTA update:

1) Camera says 13 MP but results are only as good as a 5 MP camera.
2) Charging time is 4 hours and battery lasts about a day.
3) I couldn't find a way to change theme.
4) Fingerpeint sensor is too slow, had to register three different fingerprints to make it managable.
5) UI seems old fashioned.

And here are the postives of this phone:

1) Best at this price range.
2) Ram management is good, phone feels pretty smooth.
3) Pure stock android experiance without any bloatware.
4) Speakers are loud with good quality.
